title: Listen to what Dr Alex Du (Optometrist) says about Dry Eyes

json.text: Hi and welcome to Eyecare Plus Kareela . My name is Alex and I'm your local optometrist.
Now, did you know roughly fifteen to thirty percent of people experience dry
eye symptoms? These include but are not limited to: uncomfortable,
irritated, scratchy, itchy, sore, and watery eyes. I have dry eyes and I understand.
Now, the most common form of dry eyes is when the glands across your eyelid, so
just around the bottom there are blocked. Call up and let me see how I can help you
with your dry eyes.Don't let uncomfortable dry eyes ruin your day!
